title: freeze butternut squash and lime soup
description: This quick, simple recipe makes a big batch of healthy soup. It freezes brilliantly too. Perfect with bread for a speedy make-ahead meal.Each serving provides 155kcal, 4g protein, 12g carbohydrate (of which 8.5g sugars), 10g fat (of which 5g saturates), 2.4g fibre and 0.8g salt.
ingredients: 900g/2lb butternut squash, peeled, seeds removed and cut into 1cm/½in cubes
salt and freshly ground black pepper
